title: France panorama. [No. 67/44]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Anti-news - an interview with Andre Malraux, Secretary of State in charge of Cultural Affairs. 2. Crazy art - the 5th Biennial of young artists at the Museum of Modern Art. 3. Font Romeu - a high-altitude sports school unique in Europe. 4. The France-Belgium football match.
